Name: ScrewSwitchReverse
Notes: A yellow screw that can be removed by using a Spin Attack on it. After that, it will activate a switch and it will try to make the player jump off.

Obj_arg0.Name: Force Jump?
Obj_arg0.Description: If set, it will force the player to jump off the screw after it disappears.

Obj_arg7.Name: Shadow Length
Obj_arg7.Description: Sets the shadow drop length. Default is 1000.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.
